long_description:
You enter a long, bright, and sterile hallway. There is an
awkward man in an Auriga uniform frantically searching his pockets
when, suddenly he looks up to see you and fear spreads across his
face.

You enter a long hallway and see Jim pacing back and forth
mumbling something to himself.

You enter a long hallway and see that Jim is sitting on the floor
near the entrance to the testing hangar.

You enter a hallway and...
[Jim] Huh? What? Who's there?
[Jim] Oh geez, Auriga-7B! You scared me!

You enter a long sterile hallway. Jim is standing with his hands
in his pockets, still wondering where he left his badge.

You enter a long sterile hallway.
[Jim] I hope they don't fire me for losing my badge! I like talking
to all of you robots. Especially you, Auriga-7B.
short_description: You are in a long hallway.
name: Hallway 1
